home.title: This is Vinicius.
home.subtitle: I am a software and data engineer that solves real world problems using technology.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.description: I believe that technology should be used to solve real world problems. I approach each project with a focus on usability, scalability, and maintainability.

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch
getInTouch.description: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Feel free to reach out if you'd like to connect!
